start.text: Zero will do everything in her power to assist the Captain.
Captain, Zero will be a good girl.

start_boss.text: There is no info on this ship in the database.

retreat.text: There are somethings Captain aren't satifised with, right?

out_of_missiles.text: Ugh, missiles have been used up.

engaged.text: Captain, Zero will be a good girl.
Captain, Zero will never reject the Captain.

need_help.text: Zero, will be good. So please, don't leave.
If zero.......made a mistake, please tell Zero, please do not abandon Zero.

pursuing.text: Zero will complete the Captain's mission.
Enemy have shown an opening, Zero request the Captain to issue an attack command.
Maybe going all out on the enemy will mean the Captain will not leave Zero.

running.text: Zero is carrying out the retreat command.

hull_90.text: Hull under 90%, Zero can feel, this ship's pain
Captain, Zero's ship has its hull reduced to below 90%.
Hull under 90%, Zero can still assist the captain

hull_50.text: Hull under 50%, Zero can feel, this ship is screaming in pain
Captain,Hull under 50%, Zero is requesting retreat.
Hull has been reduced to below 50%, Zero, will not refuse the Captain's command.

hull_30.text: Hull has been reduced to below 30%, please do not abandon zero, captain.

overload.text: Overloaded, Zero cannot feel this ship.

death.text: If zero.......made a mistake, please tell Zero, please do not abandon Zero.
(Image Feed) Captain, Zero is knocked out, we've sent her into the escape pod, tell Zero we are fine. (Salutes, followed by fire of explosion)
Zero, doesnt want to leave the captain......

victory.text: Zero will not hate the Captain.
Captain, can you be with Zero more?
I hope Captain can, talk to Zero more, Zero likes to hear it, likes it alot.
